archimate:TechnologyService.name: Authentication Service
archimate:TechnologyService.documentation:
Authentication Service
• Purpose: Centralized identity verification for all system access • Methods: Username/password, multi-factor authentication, single sign-on (SSO), SAML, OAuth 2.0 • Features: Password policies, account lockout, session management, identity federation • Integration: Active Directory, LDAP, cloud identity providers (Azure AD, Okta) • Compliance: HIPAA authentication requirements, audit logging, password complexity
